::Battera::

At the doorway, she hears her commlink open up.
"I'm still waiting to talk to the leader. This could take a while. 
I'm sorry.  Things are getting busy I'm afraid.  I have yet to meet 
the leader.  I"ll report just as soon as I can. Battera out."

She looked at Rex, "I guess they have already contacted some of the 
other leaers. This is good. Then soon, the talks will begin."  She 
smiled. "May still go outside for a little while?"


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Alloran2@a... wrote:

> is your progress?
